_header: The hedgehog will the cuckoo feed
_description: Prophetical verses — 141 lines in irregular rhyming lines, with refrain, ‘When cuckowe tyme cometh oft so sone’

BLLan762.First Lines:
The hedgehoge will the cookcok fedeTyll he be grete and
                    stronge…
BLLan762.Last Lines:
…And avenge not our sinfull dedeWhan coko tyme cometh eft so
                    sone
BLLan762.Note:
Transcription is from Bowers (1953)
XBowers,  Robert Hood. 
             “When Cuckow Time Cometh oft so Soon.” 
             Anglia
         73 (1953): 292-98.
